segments.text: I see the boy on that stool, and I’m just waiting for him to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and he’s not even holding on to anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, watching, like she doesn’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless they’re being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she’s completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to stop them before they get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is going to tip any second, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m just waiting for the crash, and it’s making me so nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation is just a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
